com.example.watizit.utils

Class DesignUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.watizit.utils.DesignUtil

  • public class DesignUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This util class makes it easier to manage the animations and the design of views.

        This method start a bounce-in animation for a view (which can be delayed with the start offset).
        Parameters:

        startOffset - the start offset

      • applyIcons

        public static android.text.SpannableStringBuilder applyIcons(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                                                             float fontSize)
        This method applies icons to a text, with a font size that is a percentage of the default one.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to apply icons to
        fontSize - the font size in percentage
        Returns:
        a spannable string builder with icons in

      • applyIcons

        public static android.text.SpannableStringBuilder applyIcons(java.lang.CharSequence cs,
                                                             float fontSize,
                                                             int color)
        This method applies icons to a text, with a font size that is a percentage of the default one. It also search a placeholder at the same time to change the color and size of a part of the text.
        Parameters:
        cs - the text to apply icons and color to
        fontSize - the font size in percentage
        color - the color to apply
        Returns:
        a spannable string builder with icons and color in
